useCase.name: Grant Creation Process

preconditions.precondition: Alice_novice, Bob, Communities_novice, and Guarantors_expert have access to necessary platform functionalities

useCase.trigger: New feature request for grant creation

mainSequence.step: Alice_novice initiates treasury creation process with successful completion response providing treasury address
Alice_novice creates a proposal in the forum for grant creation
Community selects proposals and gives positive/negative feedback through the forum
Alice_novice submits a treasury role proposal to BitDAO governance for further voting
Token holders cast their votes on the treasury role proposal
BitDAO admins confirm the proposal outcome and proceed to execute through funds transfers
Alice_novice receives at-a-glance transfer status information regarding grant funding
